sanskrit_verse:
इमं लोकं मातृभक्त्या पितृभक्त्या तु मध्यमम् ।
गुरुशुश्रूषया त्वेवं ब्रह्मलोकं समश्नुते ॥ २.२३३॥
transliteration:
imaṁ lokaṁ mātṛbhaktyā pitṛbhaktyā tu madhyamam |
guruśuśrūṣayā tvevaṁ brahmalokaṁ samaśnute || 2.233||
sph_interpretive_translation: Through devotion to the Mother, one attains this world; through devotion to the Father, the intermediate realm; and through service to the Guru, one fully realizes the Brahmic Realm.
